channel.title: GPT-3 on Bodacious Blog
channel.description: Recent content in GPT-3 on Bodacious Blog

item.title: Fine-tuning GPT-3
item.description: Notes on GPT-3 fine-tuning http://github.com/mullikine/fine-tuning-gpt-3 Fine-tuning GPT-3 to generate puns Aims Train GPT-3 to continue on sequences of puns Train GPT-3 to speak in puns Training Data format jsonl Sources https://github.com/taivop/joke-dataset Naive approach 1 2 3 [{"data" : "joke set 1"}, {"data": "joke set 2"} Better approach
